com.apporiented.hermesftp.streams

Class RafInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • com.apporiented.hermesftp.streams.RafInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecordReadSupport, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class RafInputStream
extends InputStream
implements RecordReadSupport
    Wrapper class for reading a RandomAccessFile through the InputStream abstraction.
    Author:
    Lars Behnke
